purpose: Facilitate the integration and orchestration of AI agents from different frameworks into a unified platform.
principle: Utilizes a modular architecture to enable seamless composition and execution of AI agents, supporting multiple AI frameworks.
reusability: Offers APIs for integrating custom AI agents, supports plug-and-play capabilities for agent composition.
limitations: Currently in alpha stage, may lack comprehensive documentation and stability.
name: beeai-platform
description: Discover, run, and compose AI agents from any framework.
highlight: Platform for discovering, running, and composing AI agents across various frameworks.
